metadata.title: AI Moon Advisor – Guía Lunar Personal
metadata.description: Genera lecturas lunares personalizadas y recetas AI de LunaChef basadas en tu carta natal, posición lunar actual e intenciones diarias.

hero.title: AI Moon Advisor
hero.subtitle: Insights lunares personales y recetas inteligentes en segundos
hero.description: Combina astrología tradicional con IA moderna. Sube tus datos de nacimiento una vez, recibe lecturas lunares diarias y deja que LunaChef sugiera platos nutritivos alineados con el elemento de hoy.

footer.disclaimer: El contenido generado por IA puede variar en precisión. Siempre revisa las lecturas y recetas antes de compartirlas con tu audiencia.
footer.consult: Para integraciones personalizadas o funciones avanzadas, contacta a nuestro equipo para una consulta.

placeholder.title: AI Moon Advisor
placeholder.description: Experimenta insights lunares personalizados impulsados por IA avanzada. Obtén lecturas lunares diarias, recetas alineadas con elementos y guía espiritual adaptada a tu carta natal.
placeholder.ctaText: Únete a la Lista de Espera

features.title: Por qué los creadores aman AI Moon Advisor
features.description: Dale a tu comunidad guía lunar diaria, rituales curados e ideas de recetas inteligentes con mínimo esfuerzo.

insights.title: Insights Lunares Personales
insights.description: La IA resume el signo lunar, fase, aspectos y tono emocional adaptado a cada carta natal.

personalization.title: Perfiles de Nacimiento Flexibles
personalization.description: Store multiple birth profiles, remember preferences, and regenerate readings for any date.

recipes.title: LunaChef AI Kitchen
recipes.description: Craft seasonal, element-aligned recipes with dietary filters, ingredient prompts, and nutrition breakdowns.

credits.title: Credit Economy Ready
credits.description: Built-in credit tracking, pricing hints, and recharge links keep monetisation under your control.

showcase.title: Two AI copilots for your lunar product
showcase.description: The advisor is split into a moon reading tab and a LunaChef recipe engine—each optimised for instant value.
benefits: Capture birth data once and reuse it across readings and recipes
Explain emotional rhythms, opportunities, and challenges in natural language
Generate element-based recipes with ingredient swaps and nutritional info
Show available credits, costs per action, and invite users to recharge
Export readings or recipes for newsletters, premium feeds, or workshops

features2.label: Experience the flow
features2.title: From birth data to actionable guidance
features2.description: Show users what changes when AI combines natal charts with the current moon.
features2.hover_tip: Select a card to preview the before/after slider
features2.slider_after_alt: After generating an AI moon reading
features2.slider_hover_description: Use the slider to reveal how AI enriches daily lunar briefings.

insights.title: Contextual Moon Reading
insights.description: Compare a simple moon summary with an AI-crafted narrative including mood, focus, and suggested rituals.

recipes.title: Element-Aligned Recipes
recipes.description: Highlight how LunaChef turns a moon element into a full recipe with nutrition notes and shopping list.

workflow.title: Creator Workflow
workflow.description: Show the difference between manual scripting and automated content ready for publication.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.description: What users say about our AI moon advisor. Perfect for creators, astrologers, and wellness professionals.

items.name: Sarah Chen
items.quote: This AI moon advisor has revolutionized how I create content for my community. The readings are insightful and the recipes are always on point!

items.name: Marcus Rodriguez
items.quote: As someone with no astrology background, this tool makes it easy to offer personalized moon guidance to my audience. Game changer!

items.name: Jennifer Kim
items.quote: The LunaChef recipes are brilliant! My followers love the element-aligned meal suggestions. Saves me hours of research.

items.name: Alex Thompson
items.quote: I use this daily to create moon-aligned content for my classes. The personalization options are exactly what I needed.

items.name: Lisa Wang
items.quote: The combination of lunar insights and recipe generation is perfect for my practice. My clients are obsessed with their personalized readings!

items.name: David Brown
items.quote: Simple, powerful, and accurate. This AI tool helps me deliver daily moon wisdom to thousands of followers effortlessly.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Key questions about the AI Moon Advisor module.

items.title: Do I need user accounts to store birth data?
items.description: Yes. The advisor is designed for signed-in users so you can offer premium readings and recipe quotas per profile.

items.title: Which AI providers are supported?
items.description: The template ships with the Vercel AI SDK, OpenAI, and prompt templates. Swap models or providers to match your pricing.

items.title: Can I change credit costs per action?
items.description: Absolutely. Both the UI and server routes expose constants so you can define the credit price for readings and recipes.

items.title: How do I localise the copy?
items.description: Texts live in `src/i18n/pages/tools/example`. Add new locales and the layout will automatically render them.

cta.title: Launch AI Moon Advisor with Mondkalender
cta.description: Deliver premium lunar experiences, monetise AI readings, and give your audience daily nourishment.
